_metadata.description: MindMeld mind mapping server - Create, manage, and explore mind maps with AI assistance

_available_resources.name: All Maps
_available_resources.description: List of all accessible mind maps

_available_tools: maps.list - List all maps with pagination (limit: 1-100, offset: 0+)
maps.get - Get specific map by UUID (id: required)
maps.create - Create new mind map (name: string, data: object)
maps.update - Update existing map (id: UUID, data: object, version: number)
_example_commands: Create a new mind map called 'Project Planning'
_setup_instructions: 1. Start the MindMeld server: FEATURE_MCP=1 npm start
2. Add this JSON config to your Warp MCP settings
3. Server will be available at http://localhost:3001/mcp/sse
4. Uses mcp-remote for reliable SSE connection handling
